original: 為中國歷史第一台遠距攻城兵器。射程、威力略遜於攻城車，但亦有造價低、射速、移動速度較快的優點，對建築物有加成的攻城器具。
text: It is the first long-range siege weapon in Chinese history. The range and power are slightly inferior to that of a siege vehicle, but it also has the advantages of low cost, fire speed, and faster movement speed. It is a siege tool that has a bonus to buildings.
